system.description: When you spend Data (knowledge of secret truths) to discover information about other families, threats, or opportunities, roll +Data spent.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: Your investigation reveals nothing useful and may alert others to your interest. You lose the Data spent.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You learn something useful about your target. Ask one question from the list below.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: Your investigation is thorough and discreet. Ask up to two questions from the list below.

system.choices:
• What are their current plans or goals?
• What resources do they control?
• What are their weaknesses or vulnerabilities?
• Who are their allies or enemies?
• What secrets are they hiding?
• How can we best approach or avoid them?
